title: tweety80123
author: tweety80123
content: astrominer is an optimized miner for DERO(and any forks that use AstroBWTv3).The core is written in golang and C, cli GUI and style inherit from dero.Currently, astrominer supports both stratum (whalesburg.com) and RPC. For now, it can only run on linux(amd64). You can download the latest version here ===> https://github.com/tj8519/astrominerHere are some infos about DERO ===> https://dero.ioDERO Discord ===> https://discord.gg/2rccWbbList of Pools ===> https://miningpoolstats.stream/deroThe official Forum ===> https://forum.dero.io
